MostCommon.description: Tread below minimum, audible leak, bulge/knot
MostCommon.recommendedAction: Daily air/tread checks; retire tires with exposed ply; fix leaks before dispatch

MostCommon.description: Inoperative or obvious defects including air leaks
MostCommon.recommendedAction: Do not operate; repair and verify during DVIR before return to service

MostCommon.description: Insufficient tiedowns, knots in straps, failure to re-examine
MostCommon.recommendedAction: Use rated tiedowns; no knots; re-check at 150 miles and at each duty status change

MostCommon.description: Expired/invalid med certificate or license; missing endorsements
MostCommon.recommendedAction: Monthly DQ file audit; automated reminders for expirations; no dispatch while invalid
